description: HOME AND AWAY: development and introduction of the innovative model in Lithuania aimed at mitigation of consequences of homelessness throughout the (re)integration into society and labour market

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Tailored model  is developed based on best EU practises and the assessment of  partner organisations’ institutional capacities development needs; social workers representing 2 partner institutions trained on practical applications of  recommendations of the model, model is practically implemented in 2 project partners’ organisations.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: HOME AND AWAY
